INSTRUCTIONS

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 433, 292, 449]]<|/det|>
- Answer all questions.

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 447, 761, 466]]<|/det|>
- Use a black or dark blue pen. You may use an HB pencil for any diagrams or graphs.

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 464, 808, 481]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 480, 565, 496]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 495, 482, 510]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 511, 363, 526]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 526, 485, 543]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 542, 337, 558]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 558, 466, 573]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 573, 666, 604]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 605, 490, 620]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[118, 399, 451, 415]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[118, 414, 443, 430]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[118, 482, 598, 500]]<|/det|>
